external_games.name: Sofia the First Royal Learning Tablet

name: Sofia the First Royal Learning Tablet
summary: Explore fun learning activities with Sofia and her animal friends on the toy tablet that introduces letters, phonics, logic and music through 8 engaging activity modes. Sofia’s voice and charming melodies encourage playtime interaction and 5 character buttons engage your child in learning and discovery. With Sofia the First Royal Learning Tablet your little one is learning happily ever after!
